title: doxo File Cabinet and Bill Pay
creator: doxo

extendedInfo.description: doxo is your file cabinet & account wallet in the cloud. Scan and store documents securely from this award-winning service. Connect to select providers to RECEIVE & PAY BILLS for free. Featured as a TOP FINANCE APP by Parade Magazine named NEW PRODUCT OF THE YEAR by the American Business Awards, see why doxo's free, award-winning service was featured in Forbes, TechCrunch, The Washington Post, PC Magazine, Mashable, iVillage, & more.â "Bottom line: I love it!" - NetBanker âFILE CABINET FEATURES: â Safely store your digital documents â Doc viewer to page through & zoom PDFs â Add document details like due dates â Snap photos to scan & upload your docs ACCOUNT WALLET FEATURES: â View your saved account numbers, logins, & more â Access your saved notes for each accountâ Store back-ups of anything in your wallet â Sync from the cloud to view your account infoDOXO'S FREE SERVICE INCLUDES: â Receive & pay paperless bills â Unlimited storage space in the cloud â Safe & Secure with bank-grade security â Quick PIN Sign-In makes it easy to access â Optional email reminders for due dates â Backup your docs to your home computer â Access documents from the app or online FILE CABINETUpload or scan documents into your file cabinet. View documents and zoom in to get a closer view. Store receipts, bills, statements, invoices, coupons, pay stubs, warrantees, vouchers, gift certificates, business cards, repair histories or any other paper document, into your secure file cabinet in the cloud. ACCOUNT WALLETAccess your saved account numbers, usernames/passwords, frequent flyer numbers, policy numbers, memberships, serial numbers, websites, phone numbers, insurance plans, tax IDs, employer info, or any other piece of information you need to find on the go. Add your account info on the doxo website and automatically sync from the cloud to view it on your Android device.SCAN AND STOREGet organized by using your Android phone or tablet as a scanner. Scan with your phone's camera to create multipage PDF documents and upload directly into your file cabinet.UNLIMITED STORAGEGet FREE, safe, and secure cloud storage. If it's in your filing cabinet, on your desk, in your wallet, or in piles throughout your house, you can store it on doxo. Get FREE, safe, and secure cloud storage for your paperless documents.VIEW AND PAY YOUR BILLSWhen your providers are on doxo, you can connect to them and receive paperless bills into your To Do box, and make FREE mobile payments right from the app. Connect to your providers, go paperless, and pay your bill for free.SYNC TO YOUR DOXO ACCOUNTOrganize Account Info and Notes in your doxo filing cabinet account from the web, and access them anywhere. Let the doxo service sync your document storage, bill pay history, and account info in the cloud, automatically, at home and across all your devices. View documents you've scanned and those you've received from your paperless providers.PRAISE FOR DOXO:â "Finally thereâs an easy excuse for tossing that not-so-cute filing cabinet from your home office. " - iVillage â  "doxo helps keep track of bills and cut down on clutter." - The Washington Postâ  "The doxo overview page becomes your own all-in-one personal bill center, reminder dashboard and online filing cabinet." - Mashableâ  "For centralizing bills, financial documents, and other important family files, doxo presents an innovative solution." - PC Magazineâ  "doxo is a useful online app service designed to help you go paper-free, pay your bills and store your personal documents online." - MakeUseOf.comâ  "Bottom line: I love it and want all my bills to go here now!" - NetBankerACCOLADES:â Featured as TOP FINANCE APP by Parade â NEW PRODUCT OF THE YEAR, Stevie Awards â Featured in "Apps for Simplifying Every Part of Your Life" by iVillage â Webby Award Nomineeâ AlwaysOn OnDemand 100 Awardâ Red Herring Global 100 Award

reviews.title: doxo app
reviews.comment: I have searching continuously for an application on google play to put on my smartphone that allows account info , payment info, website information ,and due date ,...etc . I downloaded this app to give it a try. It is the first app that have all the accounts that i deal with on it . I love it !
reviews.author: Darlena Battin

reviews.title: Great Organizer...
reviews.comment: but missing the option to pay bills, retrieve stmts with virtually every one of my accounts :-(
reviews.author: eL Dee

reviews.title: Better than Neat?
reviews.comment: I like the UI better, and doxos to do and pay features aren\'t found in other apps, but its missing the ability to upload files (versus pics).
reviews.author: Mario Duff

reviews.title: Unable to reset password
reviews.comment: I dowloaded this app and then i forgot my password or i miss typed it when i joined. Now  there is nowhere to reset it so i can use the app. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good be amazing
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I\'m looking for. Unfortunately they really don\'t work with any 3rd party... My guess is because they want to charge the business when others don\'t... Hoping they get this worked out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for organization and convenience.
reviews.comment: Awesome app with great convenient features. Really like the pin sign in and the ability to view my docs on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great service and app
reviews.comment: It\'s great to be able to call up important documents on my phone and receive and pay my bills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Allows me to store all my documents, bills and notes in one place.
reviews.author: A Google User
